Definition: Unfertilized egg. Egg is not yet fertilized
Zygote fertilized egg. Time since fertilization is 0min, corresponding to 0.00% of development
Initial flatening of the vegetal zone
Depressed vegetal zone, mesendoderm does not touch ectoderm
Cap shaped, mesendoderm completely touch ectoderm
Vase shaped due to body elongation during blastopore closure
Distinct neural plate, just before blastopore closure
8 to 9 somites, prior to schizocoelic somites
9 to 11 somites, prior to schizocoelic somites
Tailbud with enlarged pharyngeal region, from 11-13 somites
Tailbud with enlarged pharyngeal region, more than 13 somites, prior the mouth opens
Gill slits start to duplicate, hepatic caecum starts to develop
Adult-like morphology, length of less than 3cm
Adult-like morphology, length of more than 3cm
